title: Supernatural Free Download
description:
A SINISTER CASE FOR THE FEARLESS DETECTIVE
One day, a young man writes an email to a renowned detective in the world of paranormal events, recounting the mysterious disappearance of his beloved housemaid, Mrs. Susan. She took care of the house and his pregnant fiancée while he struggled to make ends meet. Super Dark Deception
Determined to uncover the truth, detective Wyatt ventures into the unknown, determined to solve the enigma and discover what really happened to Mrs. Susan. But as he delves deeper into the investigation, he realizes that the darkness lurking within the shadows holds secrets far more terrifying than he could have ever imagined.
AN INTERACTIVELY SPINE-CHILLING EXPERIENCE
Experience high-quality horror that offers a plethora of intriguing solutions. Your microphone constantly picks up sounds, making each experience unique. The louder you are, the game will prepare scarier events for you. Puzzles will test your detective and logical thinking, cameras will help you unravel the mystery of Mrs. Susan’s disappearance, and communication with a supernatural entity through the microphone, which either helps you or misleads and complicates the experience. Three endings, each dependent solely on your decisions and perceptiveness.

system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 | AMD Radeon™ RX 580
